data.title: Christian Colleges with Basketball Programs
data.meta_description: A list of the U.S. member institutions of the Council for Christian Colleges & Universities (CCCU) that have basketball programs.
data.text:
This is an alphabetical list of U.S. governing member institutions of the Council for Christian Colleges & Universities (CCCU) that have basketball programs. Send corrections to this information to webmaster@georgefox.edu.

Abilene Christian University

Abilene, TX

Denominational Affiliation: Churches of Christ

Athletic Association: NCAA D1

Team Name/Mascot: Wildcats
